Hey I am trying to rotate the robot so it is aligned with the tag and I was wondering if the command theoretically works. If it would not could anyone give a little guidance on how I would properly do this. Thanks

image977×308 17.9 KB

Seems to me like your speakerpose isn’t actually the pose of the speaker. What you should be doing is having a fixed pose for the speaker and using trig to get the angle you need given the x difference and y difference from your estimated robot pose.

100% agree here. Take a look at this line in our settings, it defines the red and blue speaker positions to aim at: FRC8513_2024/FRC8513_2024/src/main/java/frc/robot/Settings.java at main · Sisters1st/FRC8513_2024 · GitHub

Then here we have a similar function to the one you wrote above “aimAtPoint” FRC8513_2024/FRC8513_2024/src/main/java/frc/robot/Subsystems/Drivebase.java at main · Sisters1st/FRC8513_2024 · GitHub
